title: elegant swashy font suggestions?
content:
I have been commissioned to design a logo for a Chinese uber-luxury goods store and have been looking for a really swashy font, lots of lovely elegant curls and swirls ... does one exist? I thought if anyone knows, you lot do. The store sells anything from a luxury car to a massive diamond ... the store for those nouveau riche people that have got it all but want more (and can afford it!).

Any suggestions welcomed!
author: fuschia101

comments.content:
Have a look at Burgues by Ale Paul.

[http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506142006/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267")
Thank you Stephen ... that is a beautiful font and just what Iâ€™m looking for!
